Text.Page:
We've noticed the Gutrends keep their strength up by eating the {@LinkCreature:6#2011#hillwalker warthogs} and {@LinkCreature:6#2031#scavenging bears}. And us, of course, but we're already doing what we can to stay out of their food chain.

If you get out there and destroy their food source, maybe they'll finally look elsewhere and we can be rid of them.
Great! Now they'll either look somewhere else or die out trying to keep on after us.
